name: WIXI, Inc.
tag_list: domain, domains, -jp, jprs, icann, jpnic, domain-auction, domain-parking, japan
overview:
WIXI is a Japanese corporation founded in 2009. WIXI’s main focus is the secondary domain market, currently primarily focused around the .jp extension.

Domain Parking: With the launch of Japans very first consumer based parking system, WIXI is pioneering the domain parking market in Japan.

ICANN Consulting: WIXI executives are by far the most experienced in getting companies registrar accredited with ICANN. They currently have managed the process for almost half of all ICANN accredited registrars in Japan.

Back order/drop catch: WIXI is Japans top .jp drop-catch company. A pioneer in this market in Japan.

Domain auctions: WIXI is involved in .jp domain auctioning and successfully auctions of some of the highest priced domains in the .jp space.

Secondary market domain sales: WIXI offers many domains for sale on their site.

external_links.title: Big Rumble in Tokyo Over JPRS's Announcement to Offer gTLD Domains
